product_name: CamelBak Tahoe LR Paddling Hydration Waist Pack - 50 fl. oz.
long_description: A 50 fl. oz. hydration pack that leaves your upper body free to paddle, the CamelBak Tahoe LR Hydration Waist Pack is ready for your SUP days on the water. 50 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir features a welded center baffle and low-profile shape for stability. Horizontally positioned hydration compartment loads easily, holding the reservoir flat against your back. Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking. Wide-mouth port cuts weight and makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. The CamelBak Tahoe LR Hydration Waist Pack has an open mesh back panel that allows cooling air circulation. 200 cu. in. gear capacity lets you bring along small extras such as snacks, sunscreen, an uninflated PFD, an extra layer or a waterproof electronics case (not included). You can also stash small items in the pockets on the belt; if you need your hands, you can park your paddle in the holster.
short_description: A 50 fl. oz. hydration pack that leaves your upper body free to paddle, the CamelBak Tahoe LR Hydration Waist Pack is ready for your SUP days on the water.
